Reviews.Title: sunbrite tv
Reviews.Author: D. Birky
Reviews.Content: tv works very well outdoors. no trouble seeing the picture, but it should be noted it is covered by a roof and not out in direct sunlight. the remote did not control the TV and they replaced the entire TV without problem. very happy with the purchase. I would get one again.

Reviews.Title: A sweet TV!
Reviews.Author: LPJ
Reviews.Content: Great performance! Has perked up our patio. A great way to unwind after a busy day ... didn't expect to enjoy watching TV so much outside at night, but it's been a pleasure. The TV looks good, too. Got the silver. Advice: go big. Well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Novel Concept, just doesn't compare to my Samsung in my living room, office, and bedroom
Reviews.Author: Brian Wright
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV to have something outside by the hot tub to watch Sports broadcasts on cold nights in the winter relaxing in the hot tub and hot nights in the summer when cooking out. I must say overall I am very disappointed of the general appearance and the picture quality of this TV compared to my Samsung's that I have throughout my house. The overall picture quality is nowhere near what you'd expect when paying $5,000+ for a T.V. however it's nice that it can survive in all the elements so I suppose that is what you're paying for and not the picture quality.
